question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. UN Democracy Fund (UNDEF) was launched in 2005
  2. India is largest contributor to UN Democracy Fund (UNDEF)
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: UNDEF was launched in 2005 by Indian PM Manmohan Singh, the then US President George Bush and former UN Secretary General Kofi Annan in New York in for furtherance of demo-cratic values. India is the second largest contributor to the UNDEF. At the origin of the fund
